title: 082 - UBall Champions Of The World
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys get into a contentious argument about a new office game called UBall and in the argument, some shocking revelations come to light. They guys also dive into the Pod FOD and cover everything from movie theaters potentially being dead, who the guys want the next James Bond to be, what the best kind of potato is, Nick and Digs argue that Connor couldn't survive as an outdoorsman/ranch hand out in Montana, Bill has an axe to grind, and everything else. Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we close in on 1 million subscribers and our biggest giveaway ever. Send in your questions to the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening. Enjoy.
